description.message: Never forget to clock in again! TimbrApp Extension is your smart reminder for work.

help_tooltip.message: Leave the time field empty to disable its reminder. Click the trash icon to clear all fields.

notification_message_default.message: Go to $1 $2. Click here or on the extension icon to dismiss the alert.

notification_message_with_url.message: Click here or on the extension icon to open the HR portal and perform the $1 action for the $2.

notification_message_generic_with_url.message: You have multiple missed clock-ins. Click here or on the extension icon to open the HR portal to check and complete them.

notification_message_generic_default.message: You have multiple missed clock-ins. Click here or on the extension icon to dismiss the alert.
